attributes.long-description:
The internationally-acclaimed classic pirate adventure game, The Secret of Monkey Island™, gets faithfully re-imagined! Featuring an all new contemporary art style, hand-drawn and presented in HD, complete voice over by members of the original Monkey Island™ franchise cast, a re-mastered musical score using live instruments, plus scene-for-scene hot swap to seamlessly transition between Special Edition and Classic modes at anytime. The game's twisty plot leads our naive hero, Guybrush Threepwood, on a hilarious swashbuckling search for the fabled secret of Monkey Island. Tales of pirate wealth lure him to the port of Mêlée with high hopes, no money, and an insatiable curiosity. If clever enough, he will win the confidence of Mêlée's pirates and find himself blown by the winds of fate toward the terrifying and legendary Monkey Island -- an adventure that would chill the bones of even the most bloodthirsty buccaneer.

attributes.name: The Secret of Monkey Island®: Special Edition
